A

AcceptEverythingRule - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.AcceptEverythingRule.
This rule matches every request passed to it, making it suitable for use as a catch-all or last rule in a chain.
AcceptEverythingRule() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.AcceptEverythingRule
 
addRule(Rule) - Method in class org.apache.webapp.balancer.RuleChain
Adds a rule to evaluate.

B

BalancerFilter - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.BalancerFilter.
The balancer filter redirects incoming requests based on what rules they match.
BalancerFilter() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.BalancerFilter
 
BaseRule - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.BaseRule.
The BaseRule is an empty rule implementation which can be subclassed for extension.
BaseRule() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.BaseRule
 

C

CharacterEncodingRule - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.CharacterEncodingRule.
This rule redirects requests if they are for a specific character encoding.

O

org.apache.webapp.balancer - package org.apache.webapp.balancer
This package contains all classes used by the balancer webapp other than actual rule implementations.
org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules - package org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules
This package contains all the Rule implementations that are distributed with the balancer webapp.

R

RemoteAddressRule - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RemoteAddressRule.
The remote access rule redirects if the request came from specified remote address.
RemoteAddressRule() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RemoteAddressRule
 
RequestAttributeRule - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RequestAttributeRule.
This rule accepts or rejects requests based on the presence of a attribute in the request.
RequestAttributeRule() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RequestAttributeRule
 
RequestHeaderRule - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RequestHeaderRule.
This rule checks for the presence of a specific request header, optionally with a specific value.
RequestHeaderRule() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RequestHeaderRule
 
RequestParameterRule - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RequestParameterRule.
This rule accepts or rejects requests based on the presence of a parameter in the request.
RequestParameterRule() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.rules.RequestParameterRule
 
Rule - interface org.apache.webapp.balancer.Rule.
The Rule interface is implemented by load balancing rules.
RuleChain - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.RuleChain.
A RuleChain is a list of rules considered in order.
RuleChain() - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.RuleChain
Constructor.
RulesParser - class org.apache.webapp.balancer.RulesParser.
The rules parser uses Digester to parse the rules definition file and return a RuleChain object.
RulesParser(InputStream) - Constructor for class org.apache.webapp.balancer.RulesParser
